reviews.snippet: great taste,delicious. Warm people. Definitely suggesting.

extracted_snippet.original: great taste,delicious. Warm people. Definitely suggesting.

reviews.snippet: We had the Wagyu cheeseburger and it was fantastic! The burger was juicy and very tasty, additionally the toppings were fresh and a great bun.  Definitely is an upper level Japanese Wagyu, more flavorful than the American burger we are used to. Our server was very friendly and gave us the history on how the restaurant selects the Wagyu in order for it to be top shelf. We highly recommend you stop in - close to Senso-ji Temple.

Our server was very friendly and gave us the history on how the restaurant selects the Wagyu in order for it to be top shelf. We highly recommend you stop in - close to Senso-ji Temple.

reviews.snippet: Very good wagyu burger that was exactly what I was looking for along with the fries which were beyond expectation. The service was amazing, getting a look at the history and how the beef is chosen was a fun addition to the great food!!

extracted_snippet.original: Very good wagyu burger that was exactly what I was looking for along with the fries which were beyond expectation. The service was amazing, getting a look at the history and how the beef is chosen was a fun addition to the great food!!

reviews.snippet:
Visitar Godaime Wagyu Tokyo es una experiencia gastronómica inolvidable. Desde el primer momento, la atención del personal refleja la auténtica hospitalidad japonesa, con un nivel de detalle y cuidado impecable.

La carne wagyu es simplemente espectacular: jugosa, tierna y con un marmoleo perfecto que se deshace en la boca. La calidad es insuperable y convierte cada bocado en un verdadero deleite.

Sin duda, un lugar al que siempre querrás regresar.

extracted_snippet.original:
Visitar Godaime Wagyu Tokyo es una experiencia gastronómica inolvidable. Desde el primer momento, la atención del personal refleja la auténtica hospitalidad japonesa, con un nivel de detalle y cuidado impecable.

La carne wagyu es simplemente espectacular: jugosa, tierna y con un marmoleo perfecto que se deshace en la boca. La calidad es insuperable y convierte cada bocado en un verdadero deleite.

Sin duda, un lugar al que siempre querrás regresar.
extracted_snippet.translated:
Visiting Godaime Wagyu Tokyo is an unforgettable gastronomic experience. From the very first moment, the staff's attention reflects authentic Japanese hospitality, with an impeccable level of attention to detail and care.

The Wagyu beef is simply spectacular: juicy, tender, and perfectly marbling that melts in your mouth. The quality is unsurpassed, making every bite a true delight.

Without a doubt, a place you'll always want to return to.

reviews.snippet: La mejor hamburguesa de wagyu que he probado en Japón sin duda. La carne está deliciosa y el personal es super amable y simpático. Buena comida y un ambiente cercano en el que puedes ver como te lo preparan. Si estás en Asakusa no dudes en probarlo!

extracted_snippet.translated: The best wagyu burger I've tried in Japan, without a doubt. The meat is delicious and the staff is super friendly and welcoming. Great food and a warm atmosphere where you can watch it being prepared. If you're in Asakusa, don't hesitate to try it!

reviews.snippet: First wagyu burger I’ve ever had and it did not disappoint!! The sandwich was very juicy and the bun was very soft. The wait time was very short I got my food within 10 minutes. 10/10 spot!! Must try again😮‍💨

reviews.snippet: An exceptional dining experience showcasing Wagyu at its finest. The beef was perfectly marbled, tender, and rich in flavor, with each cut presented beautifully. Service was professional and attentive, and the elegant atmosphere created the perfect setting. Highly recommended for anyone seeking authentic Japanese Wagyu this is the place for it. 😮‍💨🤤

reviews.snippet: I recently visited this halal Wagyu spot and was thoroughly impressed with the quality of both the food and the service. The Wagyu was incredibly tender, flavorful, and cooked to perfection — you could really taste the difference in quality. It’s not easy to find halal options that maintain such a high standard, so this place was a real gem. The staff were welcoming and knowledgeable, helping guide us through the menu without being overbearing. Overall, it was an excellent dining experience, and I’d definitely give it a top rating. Highly recommended for anyone looking for premium halal dining.

extracted_snippet.original: I recently visited this halal Wagyu spot and was thoroughly impressed with the quality of both the food and the service. The Wagyu was incredibly tender, flavorful, and cooked to perfection — you could really taste the difference in quality. It’s not easy to find halal options that maintain such a high standard, so this place was a real gem. The staff were welcoming and knowledgeable, helping guide us through the menu without being overbearing. Overall, it was an excellent dining experience, and I’d definitely give it a top rating. Highly recommended for anyone looking for premium halal dining.

reviews.snippet: Nice new Wagyu beef shop coming to this location from its Ginza branch. Small but welcoming atmosphere. Definitely worth a visit.

reviews.snippet: Wagyu burger was amazing. Perfect for me as I follow a halal dietary requirement. The staff were very helpful and friendly. Will definitely recommend to others visiting Ginza and the new store in Asakusa.

reviews.snippet: The Wagyu bruger was extremely tasty and a very fun experience to try for the first time in Tokyo. The staff is very kind and it is also cool you can watch them prepare your meal in front of you while waiting. Overall amazing experience, would definitely recommend.

details.kid_friendliness: The restaurant has a focus on giving the wagyu experience, so everyone can enjoy. It is both halal and does not serve alcohol.

reviews.snippet: The Wagyu Burger was amazing, and it was my first experience with real wagyu. The burger was grilled to perfection and had a very good dressing. The shop as a cozy bar where food is served and eaten. The staff was also kind and friendly making the experience memorable, would  definetely recommend!

reviews.snippet: Hidden in the heart of asakusa near temple  you will find Halal wagyu Tokyo serving best cheese burger grilled to perfection. Definitely would recommend. Staff is very friendly and attentive. Reservation recommend however they accept walk in. After long day of walking around the temple best way to end your day would be to stop by at this establishment. Can’t wait to come back on my next trip to japan.  Thank you chef Koichiro & Yu it was a pleasure dining at your establishments

reviews.snippet: Tried this burger place and it was outstanding! They serve authentic Halal A5 Wagyu beef, and the quality really shows—juicy, rich, and packed with flavor. The bun was soft and fresh, toppings were just right, and the meat stayed the star of the show. A little on the pricey side, but absolutely worth it for a true gourmet Halal burger experience.
